gw.smoketest.platform.web.assertions

Class MessagesElementAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fest.assertions.Assert
      • gw.smoketest.platform.web.assertions.MessagesElementAssert

  • public class MessagesElementAssert
extends org.fest.assertions.Assert
    Used to assert conditions about the messages element used to display UI messages. This is a complex element containing messages that can be sliced in various ways, for example by severity or by destination group. However, in many cases the assertions will be very simple - for example just checking that no messages are showing. This object attempts to make it easy to check simple conditions while also allowing detailed checks - for example that there is a single warning message under a given destination group. To do this the object can be restricted to only consider a subset of the total messages (for example by restrictToCurrentPage()). It can always be set to consider all messages again by removeRestriction()
